mapper.select: SELECT b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.Contents , b.wdate , u.nickName , b.Price , b.image1 FROM Board_Items b, AnnaUser u WHERE b.uidx = u.uidx and b.uidx = #{uidx} and b.item_idx not like #{item_idx} order by item_idx limit 1,6

SELECT count(*) FROM Board_Items b inner join AnnaUser u on b.uidx = u.uidx where b.isDel = 'N'
AND b.title like concat ('%',#{searchVal},'%')
AND (b.content like concat ('%',#{searchVal},'%') OR u.name like concat ('%',#{searchVal},'%')
and cate_idx = #{cate_idx}

SELECT b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.Contents , b.wdate , b.cate_idx , image1 , image2 , image3 , image4 , image5 , image6 , image7 , image8 , image9 , image10 , u.nickname , b.Keyword , b.Price , b.offer , b.state
FROM Board_Items b , AnnaUser u WHERE b.uidx = u.uidx AND b.item_idx = #{item_idx}

select min(Price) , b.item_idx , b.Title , b.uidx , b.Contents , b.wdate , b.cate_idx , image1 , u.nickname , b.Keyword , b.Price , b.offer , b.state from Board_Items b inner join AnnaUser u on b.uidx = u.uidx where b.isDel = 'N' order by b.wdate desc
AND b.title like concat ('%',#{searchVal},'%')
AND (b.content like concat ('%',#{searchVal},'%') OR u.name like concat ('%',#{searchVal},'%')
and cate_idx = #{cate_idx}
limit 1,1
